title: Find Missing Number
description: Given an array nums containing n distinct numbers in the range [0, n], return the only number in the range that is missing from the array.

solutions.solutionText: function missingNumber(nums) { const n = nums.length; const expectedSum = n * (n + 1) / 2; const actualSum = nums.reduce((sum, num) => sum + num, 0); return expectedSum - actualSum; }
